column5: Pretty awesome day on the lake today.Number of trout and wife and I got into a bunch of Whitefish and that was real fun and steady action.Kept 4 whitefish for smoking.Its finally stopped snowing and weather was a +1c so roughly 33f.Bit windy but can deal with that.Weather wise it's going to get real warm this week up around 10-15c.Thats going to get snow melting and get us on our way to some open water.Quite a bit of snow since our foot we got but made for a awesome smooth ride in New powder.Had the lake to ourselves.
Looks like winter is endless up in NWO! May as well enjoy.
We have no other choice but to enjoy it.Big temp change now so will be much more enjoyable.
Bring on spring! Hopefully no huge floods out there for you guys this year. Up in Nunavut now just dying to get home and get fishing.
No chance of floods this year.Water levels will come up as usuall and will need it as water levels pretty low in fall already.
